projectDescription: A polished markdown editor with real-time preview, syntax highlighting, diagrams and math.
keyFeatures: Real-time Markdown preview with split-pane editor
Mermaid diagrams support (flowcharts, sequence, ER, Gantt, class diagrams)
KaTeX math rendering (inline and display mode)
Syntax highlighting for 16+ languages via Shiki
Markdown linting with one-click auto-fix via remark-lint
100% client-side with zero tracking and zero accounts
GitHub-style alerts (NOTE, TIP, IMPORTANT, WARNING, CAUTION)
Full GFM support with tables and footnotes
publicApiSurface: Document Management: CRUD operations via IndexedDB
View Modes: editor, split, preview modes
Syntax Highlighting: Shiki with One Dark Pro theme
Mermaid Renderer: Diagram rendering via mermaid.js
Markdown Linter: remark-lint integration with auto-fix
Status Bar: Real-time document statistics (lines, words, chars)
